publications.name: Go vs CPython: Visual comparison of concurrency and parallelism options
publications.summary:
Using MPG diagrams to see the differences between Threading, Multiprocessing and Asyncio, the 3 official CPython options, and Go Runtime Goroutines behaviours. Animated GIFs included!!

The article was used as input for the PythonBrasil 2017 presentation available on https://youtu.be/su62_FkIsrg (slides on http://slides.com/alanjds/grumpy-pybr2017)

publications.name: BooViews: Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis on Product Reviews combining SVM and CRF in Portuguese
publications.publisher: PROPOR 2016 - International Conference on the Computational Processing of Portuguese
publications.summary: Are covered techniques to classify reviews polarity, extract product aspects and classify them. The resulting SVM classifier got 91.7% of precision in classifying the sentiment of the reviews, 74.2% of F1‐score using CRF to extract the product aspects and 79.9% of precision classifying aspect’s polarity.
